ComicInfo.Series: My Little Pony: Set Your Sail
ComicInfo.Summary: Land Ho! Er... the End of the Series Ho! When Pipp and Izzy set sail for their underwater adventure, they hoped for smooth waters, but the seven seas are falling apart! Queen Calla Lily has been hoarding stolen power, and until the seven anchors are returned to their rightful kingdoms, all ponykind, under the sea and on land, is at risk. Luckily, a swashbuckling crew of pirates have recruited Princess Pipp and her besties to save everypony. With the Mane Six at the helm, nothing can stand in their way!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-24 23:17:07. [CVDB1067529]
ComicInfo.Characters: Hitch Trailblazer, Izzy Moonbow, Misty Brightdawn, Pipp Petals, Sunny Starscout, Zipp Storm
ComicInfo.Teams: Earth Ponies, Mane 5, Seaponies, Unicorns, Winged Steeds
